# NSSlider.SliderType.linear

**Case**

A bar representing a range, and a knob indicating the currently selected value.

## Declaration

```swift
case linear
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **NSSlider.SliderType.circular**: A dial representing an angular range.

items.description: A dial representing an angular range.
items.name: NSSlider.SliderType.circular
